  • Constructor Details

    • CauchyChannel

      public CauchyChannel​(double spontaneousCloseProb, double cauchyScale, double cauchyNoticeableT)
      Constructor for Cauchy Channel
      Parameters:
      spontaneousCloseProb - probability to drop connection at each packet
      cauchyScale - scale factor of cauchy distribution
      cauchyNoticeableT - mean/threshold of distribution values
